#summary This Wiki page describes how you can take a log easily
#labels Featured

= Requirements =

LCR 1.1.2+


= How To =

The best way to make a good log, download Terminal Emulator from the Market and start it.
Then enter the following lines. 
Press enter after each line!

(_*Always without the -->...*_)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

su

log-debug start --> to activate logging

*OR*

log-debug stop --> to deactivate logging

*OR*

log-debug status --> to display current logging status

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The logs will show up on the SDCard as debug_....log.

Upload them zipped together and attach them to your bugreport.
Thanks :)
